I'm confused with sizing.Is it true to size ? I say yes. When I first took them out of the package, I tried them on and was very happily surprised. They stretch well and stay in place! No creeping down. These cotton underwear are the most comfortable pairs of underwear I have ever worn. Trying to fit a petite 16 woman who is 5'0. Will this work? Probably - they have a lot of stretch to them. I’m 5’6 and 120lbs, what size would fit me best? I would see that to know how big is your ministry? 120 mm should give you a size S I’m between sizes also 6 to an 8 . 5’5” weigh 133 haven’t measured my hips which size is suit for me? I would go with a size medium for they run true to size. I weigh about 115 pounds and normally wear size 4 pants or size small panties. buy a small or medium in these panties? A small. I'm 5'2", weigh 123 lbs., and got a medium. It fits good, but I probably could have gotten a small myself, but it may have been a little too small for me. I'm kind of in between with sizes, so I have to try things on first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m very pleased with my purchase of the most comfortable underwear I’ve worn in a long time. They are soft, size is right, waist band is just right and appear well made. A must have item at a good price, colors are an added perk and are good for the bottom line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are nice, fit well, don't creep and the band doesn't roll
reviews.reviewText: I thought a wide elastic band would roll for sure, but it doesn't! They wash nice, feel nice and fit very well. Get yourself some! I'm very picky and have worn the same brand forever, but when so many things disappeared during the 2020 global crisis, my old brand went away and never returned. I was skeptical about getting any other brand, but pleasantly surprised when I tried these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are very comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these nude underwear to wear under my white scrubs for work, and I couldn't be happier with them. They are perfect for the job - comfortable, soft, and they provide the right coverage without being noticeable under my scrubs. The fabric is breathable, and the fit is fantastic. I highly recommend these underwear to anyone in need of comfortable, seamless undergarments, especially for wearing under light-colored clothing. They have become an essential part of my work wardrobe, and I am very pleased with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These underwear are super comfortable and fit well, however I wish the lace didn't go up so high on my body. The lace is pretty, however sometimes you can see them above a pair of jeans if the jeans are lower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm 5'1, 115 pounds, very small-boned and short-waisted. I'm also a middle-aged mom.I got the R6004S style in the colors "skin" and "white," in size small.The fabric is thin, but I don't like wearing thick full-cotton underwear, so this is a good thing for me.The lace waistband is what really made me purchase these panties. I'm not a full-on lacey thong/tanga/cheeky panty type of woman. I wish I could be that woman, but I'm not. But having that bit of lace on the waistband adds that little feminine touch to an otherwise basic panty. That's enough for this plain Jane.Aside from adding that feminine aesthetic to the panty, the lace waistband makes for a smoother "hug" factor at the waist if you know what I mean. I'm not a fan of thin elastic digging into my waist-area, and the wider and softer waistband that the lace provides prevents that from happening.Also, the lace itself is very soft. VERY soft. I can't speak for how well it will wear over time, but it seems like it will last at least one year of regular wear.On me, the rise is moderate, falling right between the rises of the bikini and brief. This is another plus for me because I can no longer wear low-rise anything, and because I'm short-waisted, regular briefs tend to land above my natural waistline.As for sizing, I would say it is accurate. I always buy "small" in underwear, and this panty seemed true to size. However, if I were to gain weight, I feel I would need to size up to a "medium" when I buy these again.The color "skin" is a peachy-beige and is very pretty in person. The "white" is a true pure white. I'm happy with my purchase and I would definitely get these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and pretty
reviews.reviewText: I love these panties because the fit is firm but not tight and the fabric is soft and light and feels like a second skin, even if very hot weather. The lacy top sloths any muffin top so I have nice outline in stretch leggings and the colours are really pretty. I have washed them several times now and there is no change to the fabric and fit so I expect they will be long lasting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like that they have a higher % of cotton. They don’t slip down and are very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They are cute! I need cotton underwear to prevent infections so the vag can breathe. I feel the price should go down a few dollars though! These are pretty good quality, not super super thick where the underwear can show a panty line in pants/jeansUPDATE: 1/11/24I just bought two more packs while they were on sale! I love them! also the underwear washes well and does not shrink either!

reviews.reviewTitle: Soft, breathable fabric with just enough stretch.
reviews.reviewText: Fabric seems of great quality, product is comfortable to use.Only issue is the wear of item starts too soon (loose threads are showing up in just 2 days of usage).
Super confortable et tiens bien en place. Je vais en racheter à coup sûr.

These were exactly what I was looking for to wear with my work pants. There is no bunching and the absolute best part for me, is that the waist band is snug but does not dig in whatsoever. Could have got a smaller size as they did not shrink after washing.
